name: Sir Jack Donkey (Chapter 1 DEMO)
description:
A quick game series I'm making to test my knowledge on RPGMaker. This is not a game I'm taking seriously but is instead made to goof off with my friends.

What I plan on:

At least 30 minutes of gameplay per chapter.

Around 10 chapters.

4 unique endings

A story that doesn't make sense in the slightest.

And one optional side story and mini dungeon per chapter.
